body:
hey guys,
i am a editor, if you want a banner for youtube or a logo or just a background,
leave a reaction and say why i should pick you as winner. also leave your skype username in the reaction so when i pick you i can add you on skype and we talk there about the picture.
good luck all of you guys.

my youtube channel is Bunimation https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCtFtix3uPssupFxWktbVfJw, go and subscribe :)

here are some pictures i made:
http://i.imgur.com/izkSSmG.jpg
http://i.imgur.com/OfKpVv3.jpg
